communityDuas.author: Aziz
communityDuas.dua: Please make dua for my mother who is recovering from surgery. May Allah grant her complete healing and strength during this difficult time.

communityDuas.author: Amina
communityDuas.dua: I have an important job interview tomorrow. Please pray that Allah guides me to what is best for my deen and dunya.

communityDuas.author: Omar
communityDuas.dua: My family is going through financial hardship. Please make dua that Allah provides for us from sources we cannot imagine.

communityDuas.author: Fatima
communityDuas.dua: Please pray for my brother who is struggling with his studies. May Allah grant him success and make his path easy.

communityDuas.author: Hassan
communityDuas.dua: I am seeking Allah's guidance in choosing the right spouse. Please make dua that He leads me to someone who will be good for my faith.

communityDuas.author: Khadija
communityDuas.dua: My grandmother is very ill. Please pray for her recovery and that Allah grants her peace and comfort in her final days if that is His will.

communityDuas.author: Yusuf
communityDuas.dua: I am struggling with anxiety and depression. Please make dua that Allah grants me peace of mind and strength to overcome these challenges.

communityDuas.author: Aisha
communityDuas.dua: Please pray for the Muslim ummah around the world, especially those facing persecution and hardship. May Allah protect and strengthen them.

communityDuas.author: Ibrahim
communityDuas.dua: I am trying to memorize the Quran but finding it difficult. Please make dua that Allah makes it easy for me and blesses my efforts.

communityDuas.author: Maryam
communityDuas.dua: My parents are getting older and I want to be a better daughter to them. Please pray that Allah helps me serve them with love and patience.
